title: FortiWeb multiple vulnerabilities
description: Older versions of FortiWeb are subject to three vulnerabilities: 1. OS command injection: A WebUI administrator user may run system commands when executing a report 2. Reflected XSS: A WebUI administrator user may perform a reflected XSS attack via an improperly sanitized parameter in the FortiWeb auto update service page 3. Password field with autocomplete enabled: The WebUI FTP backup page contains a password field with HTML form autocomplete enabled

operating_system.description: FortiWeb: greater equal 5.0.0, less equal 5.3.4, fixed in 5.3.5

definitions.impact: OS command injection, autocomplete in html form
